name: Email Design Studio
author: Smackcoders

sections.description:
Prepare email designs for your store emails that convey a positive impression about your brand. Email Design Studio eases your email template designing by providing tools to produce distinctive email designs better than your competitors. You can get the exact feeling of working in the WordPress interface that you can access the plugin in the native WordPress customizer. It says ‘No Way!’ to code. The plugin is flexible for any WordPress user. Even a buddy WordPress user can use this user-friendly plugin like an expert.

Highlights

You can get more Pro-like features for free. Here are the highlighted features of the Email Design Studio plugin.

  • Create designs for WooCommerce core email types like New Account, Reset Password, Blog Comment, Note to Customer.
  • Able to quickly design emails using the prebuilt templates.
  • Customize the text and style of email template Header, Container, and Footer.
  • 7 cool container elements for email templates such as Image, Order Details, Text, Customer Details, Button, Divider, and Border Details.
  • Add social links to your emails that will maximize your social traffic.
  • Inbuilt SMTP configurations to send emails. Leave your worries to install a separate plugin.
  • Options to monitor email logs for each template.
  • Send Test emails to check and build a beautiful email design for your store.

How to get started with Email Design Studio

Download the pack from above and install it on your WordPress website. Or simply search for ‘Email design studio’ inside the plugins page in your WordPress dashboard. If you find the plugin, click the Install button and then activate the plugin to use it.

Once you install it, you can find the plugin by visiting ‘Settings >> Email Design Studio’. Clicking on it will redirect you to the plugins page which is similar to the WordPress default Customizer page. Now start designing the emails in the way you want.

Support

We feel glad to assist you. You can ask any related question about the plugin using the support forum.

Contributors & Developers

“Email Design Studio” is open source software. The following people have contributed to this plugin.
